markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- Carved from white ash wood, a staff of air crackles with electrical sparks, and a breeze always follows the wielder. While wielding a _staff of air_, you feel lighter on your feet, and you can Step into difficult terrain once per round. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Air **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 60 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_gale blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=917)
  • **1st** [_air bubble_](/Spells.aspx?ID=5), [_gust of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=143)
Staff of Air (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 450 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **2nd** [_ash cloud_](/Spells.aspx?ID=865), [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210)
  • **3rd** [_blazing dive_](/Spells.aspx?ID=869), [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [_wall of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=367)
Staff of Air (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 1,800 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **4th** [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), _ash cloud_
  • **5th** _blazing dive_, [_lightning storm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=701)
name: Staff of Air
